# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.4 on Sun Nov  8 23:18:11 2020
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [1082:259906]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [7473:773186]
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j LOG
-A INPUT -s 172.16.21.0/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.21.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-port-unreachable
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/19 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.0.0/19 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.0.0/19 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/19 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 25 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -j LOG
-A INPUT -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-port-unreachable
-A FORWARD -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-host-prohibited
COMMIT
# Completed on Sun Nov  8 23:18:11 2020
